item.description: This gathering is for people who want to start meditating or want to deepen their meditation practice. Many meditation practices are helpful to relax, feel more peaceful and learn concentration. But meditation is even more than that, it is the way to be in direct contact with the Divine inside. Come this Monday if you want to experience with simple tool how to connect with God inside of you. As Master Jesus said "The realm of God is within you". it was no joke.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ring the bell at the front wooden door unless other instructions posted on the door
item.name: January Meditation Gathering Monday (MLK week end)
